mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expense (budget_id, amount, description, user_id) VALUES (#{budgetId}, #{amount}, #{description}, #{userId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM expense WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.budget_id AS budgetId, b.category AS category, e.amount, e.description, e.created_at AS createdAt, e.updated_at AS updatedAt, e.user_id AS userId FROM expense e JOIN budget b ON e.budget_id = b.id WHERE e.budget_id = #{budgetId} AND e.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY e.created_at DESC
